General.Name: Keboda Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: KEBODA TECHNOLOGY Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive electronics and related products for automotive industry in China. The company offers automotive electronics products comprising lighting control systems, such as HID electronic ballasts, LED controllers, AFS adaptive controllers, etc.; and motor control system products including cooling fan controller, air conditioning blower controller, fuel pump controller, etc. It also provides energy management system products, which includes DCDC converters, DCAC inverters, etc.; intelligent actuator including AGS actuator, electronic water valve actuator, electric vehicle charging door actuator etc.; and chassis suspension controller, such as DCC controller, ASC controller, CCU controller etc. In addition, the company offers automotive electrical products including cigarette lighters, power outlets, washing systems, automotive sensors, AVS actuators, liquid control valves, and other products; engine components, such as electric pumps, preheaters, clamps, and others; and harness products including auto wiring harness, engine pre-assembled wiring harness, and special wiring harness. KEBODA TECHNOLOGY Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shanghai Oubao Electric Technology Corp. and changed its name to KEBODA TECHNOLOGY Co., Ltd. in November 2007. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
